text: Glory to the Brave is the first album from the Swedish power metal band HammerFall. The cover art was painted by Andreas Marshall. ==Track listing== == Personnel == * Joacim Cans - Lead Vocals & Background Harmonies * Oscar Dronjak - Guitars & Backing Vocals * Fredrik Larsson - Bass Guitar & Backing Vocals * Glenn Ljungström - Guitars * Jesper Strömblad - Drums (credited, but does not play on this album) * Patrik Rafling - Drums Category:HammerFall albums Category:Power metal Category:1997 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Heavy metal albums Category:Nuclear Blast albums
title: Glory to the Brave
